text: aur ve kahate hai, "ye jaanavar aur khetee varjit aur surakshit hai. inhen to keval vahee kha sakata hai, jise ham chaahen." - aisa ve svayan apane khayaal se kahate hai - aur kuchh chaupae aise hai, jinakee peethon ko (savaaree ke lie) haraam thahara liya hai aur kuchh jaanavar aise hai jinapar allaah ka naam nahin lete. yah yah unhonne allaah par jhooth ghada hai, aur vah sheeghr hee unhen unake jhooth ghadane ka badala dega
